title: CONCEPT-HF
description: Data model specification documenting both individual-level, sub-individual level and area-level data required to respond to the CONCEPT heart failure research question. The data model specification includes the cohort definition, individual-level and area-level variable specification including data dictionaries and crosswalks for semantic interoperable definition of certain variables (i.e. health status, clinical conditions and comorbidities - (def)). See below some of the conventions used to document this data model.
